Confalonieri , Ospedale Trieste , Italy Patients We plan enrol 30 patient : Inclusion criterion - Age > 45 year - Tracheotomy - History COPD demonstrate pulmonary function test - Informed Consent Exclusion criterion - Allergy macrolides - Life expectancy < 1 year Exhaled breath condensate ( EBC ) The breath condensate sample collect use specially design condense chamber ( Ecoscreen ; Jaeger , Hoechberg , Germany ) . The exhaled air enter left chamber though one-way inlet outlet valve , thus keep chamber close . The subject wear noseclips breathe tidally mouthpiece connect condenser ten minute . Approximately 1 ml sample material transfer 2-ml plastic tube store -70°C . Interleukin-6 assay Interleukin-6 concentration breath condensate measure use specific enzyme immunoassay kit ( EIA ) ( Cayman Chemical , Ann Arbor , USA ) . The assay directly validate mean gas chromatography/mass spectrometry order obtain high correlation ( r=0.95 ) know amount IL-6 concentration measure EIA . The detection limit assay 1.5 pg/ml two-hour development period .
